summary: Draft app that supports uploads with editable upload fields and configurable watermark options.

existing_features.title: Add an artwork editing flow that allows a signed-in user to edit all fields that are available on upload (title, description, price, and image), reusing the existing Upload page UI.
Extend React Query hooks to support updating an existing artwork, and wire the Upload/Edit form submission to call the correct mutation (create vs update) with proper cache invalidation.
Add a “SOLD” watermark display option in the UI so that sold artworks can optionally render a watermark overlay on the image (instead of only the small SOLD badge).

new_feature_requests.summary: Enable editing of all upload fields.
Update backend authorization so that editing an artwork is permitted for the artwork owner as well as admins, while preserving existing security checks for other operations.

projectName: Enable editing of all artwork upload fields and add SOLD watermark display option
